title: Choose from all 18 courts on BBC iPlayer (UK only)
description: The triumphs, upsets and fightbacks from the world’s greatest tennis tournament.
excerpt: The triumphs, upsets and fightbacks from the world’s greatest tennis tournament. Every court, every match - live from SW19. Get closer to the action.
text: Home News Sport Weather iPlayer Sounds Bitesize CBeebies CBBC Food Home News Sport Business Innovation Culture Travel Earth Video Live WimbledonThe triumphs, upsets and fightbacks from the world’s greatest tennis tournament. Every court, every match - live from SW19. Get closer to the action.Relive all the action from day three of Wimbledon.Qasa Alom looks back at the day’s play at Wimbledon, with highlights from the big matches.Live coverage of Wimbledon 2025 from the All England Club.Court 18: Auger-Aliassime, Shnaider and KhachanovThese matches on Court 18 include Felix Auger-Aliassime v Jan-Lennard Struff and moreCourt 12: Anisimova, Lehecka and BellucciThese court 12 matches include Renata Zarazua v Amanda Anisimova and more.Court 14: Noskova, Fernandez and SiegemundThese court 14 matches include Leylah Fernandez v Laura Siegemund and moreCourt 17: Busca, Mertens and GarinThese matches on Court 17 include Elise Mertens v Ann Li and more.Court 9: Bolelli, Samsonova and VerbeekThese Court 9 matches include Behar/Vliegen v Bolelli/Vavassori and more.No.1 Court: GB's Norrie, Boulter and FritzThese No.1 Court matches included Cameron Norrie v Frances Tiafoe and moreNo.2 Court: Keys, Osaka and GB’s HarrisThese No.2 Court matches include Olga Danilovic v Madison Keys and more.Centre Court: GB's Raducanu, Sabalenka and AlcarazThese Centre Court matches include Emma Raducanu v Marketa Vondrousova and moreNo.3 Court: Kartal, Paolini and RublevThese No.3 Court matches include Viktoriya Tomova v GB’s Sonay Kartal and more.Court 8: Krejcikova, Goffin and StearnsThese court 8 matches include Putintseva/Stearns v Chan/Krejcikova and more.Court 11: Joint, Etcheverry and KhromachevaThese court 11 matches include Birrell/ Joint v Eikeri/ Ninomiya and more.Court 4: GB's Burrage, Kartal and EvansThese Court 4 matches include Burrage/ Kartal v Bouzas Maneiro/Cavalle-Reimers and more.Court 16: Mannarino, GB's Dart and KesslerThese Court 16 matches include Kessler/Tauson v GB's Dart/Lumsden and moreCourt 10: Svitolina, Kostyuk and HalysThese court 10 matches include Aliaksandra Sasnovich v Elina Svitolina and moreCourt 7: Haddad Maia, Galfi and MesikThese court 7 matches include Beatriz Haddad Maia v Dalma Galfi and more.Court 15: Thompson, Nakashima and JarryThese Court 15 matches include Jordan Thompson v Benjamin Bonzi and moreCourt 5: Krueger, Cirstea and WuAshlyn Krueger v Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova and more.Court 6: Melo, Michelsen and SmithThese matches on Court 6 include Matos/Melo v Dodig/Luz and more.BBC One: Rained-off MorningReplays and analysis from a rain-soaked morning in SW19GB's Cameron Norrie takes on Frances Tiafoe on No.1 Court.BBC One: Kartal, Sabalenka, AlcarazBBC One afternoon coverage of Tomova v Kartal, Sabalenka v Bouzkova and Tarvet v Alcaraz.BBC Two: Norrie, Sierra, Borges, RadacanuBBC Two afternoon and evening coverage of Norrie v Tiafo, Boulter v Sierra, and more.BBC Two: Radacanu, Fery, FritzBBC Two evening coverage of Emma Radacanu v Markéta Vondroušová.

Wimbledon

The triumphs, upsets and fightbacks from the world’s greatest tennis tournament. Every court, every match - live from SW19. Get closer to the action.

  • Relive all the action from day three of Wimbledon.
  • Qasa Alom looks back at the day’s play at Wimbledon, with highlights from the big matches.
  • Live coverage of Wimbledon 2025 from the All England Club.
  • Court 18: Auger-Aliassime, Shnaider and Khachanov
    These matches on Court 18 include Felix Auger-Aliassime v Jan-Lennard Struff and more
  • Court 12: Anisimova, Lehecka and Bellucci
    These court 12 matches include Renata Zarazua v Amanda Anisimova and more.
  • Court 14: Noskova, Fernandez and Siegemund
    These court 14 matches include Leylah Fernandez v Laura Siegemund and more
  • Court 17: Busca, Mertens and Garin
    These matches on Court 17 include Elise Mertens v Ann Li and more.
  • Court 9: Bolelli, Samsonova and Verbeek
    These Court 9 matches include Behar/Vliegen v Bolelli/Vavassori and more.
  • No.1 Court: GB's Norrie, Boulter and Fritz
    These No.1 Court matches included Cameron Norrie v Frances Tiafoe and more
  • No.2 Court: Keys, Osaka and GB’s Harris
    These No.2 Court matches include Olga Danilovic v Madison Keys and more.
  • Centre Court: GB's Raducanu, Sabalenka and Alcaraz
    These Centre Court matches include Emma Raducanu v Marketa Vondrousova and more
  • No.3 Court: Kartal, Paolini and Rublev
    These No.3 Court matches include Viktoriya Tomova v GB’s Sonay Kartal and more.
  • Court 8: Krejcikova, Goffin and Stearns
    These court 8 matches include Putintseva/Stearns v Chan/Krejcikova and more.
  • Court 11: Joint, Etcheverry and Khromacheva
    These court 11 matches include Birrell/ Joint v Eikeri/ Ninomiya and more.
  • Court 4: GB's Burrage, Kartal and Evans
    These Court 4 matches include Burrage/ Kartal v Bouzas Maneiro/Cavalle-Reimers and more.
  • Court 16: Mannarino, GB's Dart and Kessler
    These Court 16 matches include Kessler/Tauson v GB's Dart/Lumsden and more
  • Court 10: Svitolina, Kostyuk and Halys
    These court 10 matches include Aliaksandra Sasnovich v Elina Svitolina and more
  • Court 7: Haddad Maia, Galfi and Mesik
    These court 7 matches include Beatriz Haddad Maia v Dalma Galfi and more.
  • Court 15: Thompson, Nakashima and Jarry
    These Court 15 matches include Jordan Thompson v Benjamin Bonzi and more
  • Court 5: Krueger, Cirstea and Wu
    Ashlyn Krueger v Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova and more.
  • Court 6: Melo, Michelsen and Smith
    These matches on Court 6 include Matos/Melo v Dodig/Luz and more.
  • BBC One: Rained-off Morning
    Replays and analysis from a rain-soaked morning in SW19
  • GB's Cameron Norrie takes on Frances Tiafoe on No.1 Court.
  • BBC One: Kartal, Sabalenka, Alcaraz
    BBC One afternoon coverage of Tomova v Kartal, Sabalenka v Bouzkova and Tarvet v Alcaraz.
  • BBC Two: Norrie, Sierra, Borges, Radacanu
    BBC Two afternoon and evening coverage of Norrie v Tiafo, Boulter v Sierra, and more.
  • BBC Two: Radacanu, Fery, Fritz
    BBC Two evening coverage of Emma Radacanu v Markéta Vondroušová.
